jirleech wrote:

> We are in the process of upgrading to Heritrix 1.4 and we've noticed
> that when when the crawl completes and the logging status says
> complete, the app never seems to exit or shutdown.  Any thoughts? 
> Thanks.

After finishing a crawl, Heritrix waits around unless you explicitly ask 
it to shutdown via 'Shut down Heritrix software' link on main index 
page.  Are you suggesting that you are hitting the shutdown link and its 
not going down for you?
Yours,
St.Ack
